channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 06:39 Air anxiety in Rivne region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 06:39 Air anxiety in Rivne region follow the following messages.#Rivne_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
